localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
nodes.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
nodes.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform
nodes.author: Sush

nodes.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
nodes.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing
nodes.author: Notty

nodes.excerpt: TabFloater improves your productivity by providing a "Picture-in-Picture" functionality, but it's not limited to video - you can use it with any website!
nodes.title: TabFloater - Browser extension to use picture-in-picture with any website

nodes.excerpt: Easynote is customizable productivity and work managent platform scalable to any team or project. It allows you to organise everything in one single place.
nodes.title: Easynote - One tool to manage all your work in one single place
nodes.author: Mensur Zahirovic

nodes.excerpt: Recur comes packed with features, iOS-specific styling to make Recur fit right into your home-screen making subscription tracking simple and fast.
nodes.title: Recur - Keep track of your subscriptions
nodes.author: Swapnanil Dhol

nodes.excerpt: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
nodes.title: Apple Silicon App Test - Test your apps for compatibility before you buy an M1 Mac

nodes.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
nodes.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Unleash the power of AI to generate 100% original content that reads like it was written by a human - and do it in seconds. No more copy & paste. No more spinning.
nodes.title: AI Article Writer - Generate articles and blog posts in seconds with AI
nodes.author: Samanyou Garg

nodes.excerpt: Stay organized and social with Gamelib ~ Store your games in libraries, log playthroughs to your diary, rate and review games, follow friends, create custom ranked/unranked lists, see upcoming and popular games, and more.
nodes.title: Gamelib 2.0 - Keep track of, discover and socialize about games.
nodes.author: Benjamin Akar

nodes.excerpt: Jel is the video game for work. Jel is a collaboration tool designed for teams who also play games. Speak naturally as avatars, without using your camera. Jel is the always-on video game you can use all day with your team to hang out or get stuff done.
nodes.title: Jel - The video game for work.
nodes.author: Greg Fodor

nodes.excerpt: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
nodes.title: Finley - Put your debt capital management on autopilot
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
nodes.title: Yada - Never rewrite anything again
nodes.author: Akshay Pall

nodes.excerpt: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
nodes.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See whoâ€™s watching and engaging with your content

nodes.title: WhatsApp Actions for HubSpot - Send WhatsApp messages from HubSpot workflows

nodes.title: Make Time App - Make time for what matters

nodes.excerpt: Writer is beautiful, secure and fast text editor and notes app for iPhone, iPad and soon for Mac and Apple Watch. It has many features like Markdown support, syncing between devices via secure Apple Cloud, customizable typography and more...
nodes.title: Writer - Beautiful, fast, Apple native notes app with Markdown
nodes.author: Michal Jach

nodes.excerpt: Product Buffs equips teams with the skills and knowledge they need to build the best possible propositions through 5 weeks of hands-on product discovery coaching.
nodes.title: Product Buffs - We help teams avoid building the wrong product
nodes.author: Craig Watson

nodes.excerpt: RevOps Deal Studio lets you easily build the perfect sales agreement templates with our block editor and end the hassle of copying and pasting from one agreement to the next. To help you get started, check out our gallery of pre-made templates.
nodes.title: RevOps Deal Studio - Building blocks for better sales agreements
nodes.author: Chris Corcoran

nodes.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
nodes.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Shoutout makes it incredibly easy to tap into your existing social proof and turn it into a beautiful "Wall of Love". Capture, curate, and publish a wall in less than 3 minutes ğŸ’¯
nodes.title: Shoutout - Attract more customers by highlighting why people trust you

nodes.excerpt: Wildcast is a patent-pending networking platform for those in the podcast industry to connect and podcast together! You can build a profile as a podcast or guest, browse others to connect with, add them to your network, and start collaborating.
nodes.title: Wildcast - Patent-pending podcast networking platform
nodes.author: Madison Catania
